text: show your code which you write

Hello All,
So i reached out to HubSpot and they said there was no work around this and that modules are made to show once on a page.
Here's my problem.
on my landing page I have 3 sets of tabs in my template. They all should display their own information and images within its proper tab.
However they all show the same information even when I input different information within the different tabs.
Also upon clicking a tab all the other tabs change with it which shouldnt happen.
I attached an image to give a better visual
i thionk you are using the module wrong.
I would create a repeating group for the tab/panel sections.
